description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, styling, and the main App component, then renders the App component inside a DOM element with the ID 'root' using React 18's createRoot API.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for React DOM rendering from the DOM element with the provided ID.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree starting with <React.StrictMode><App/></React.StrictMode> inside the root.
